Displaying 1-20 of 2,894

Description

Create re-usable templates for sending message campaigns. Included are four system templates which will work across most mobile devices.

Tips

You can use placeholders to pull in dynamic content. The following placeholders can be included in your template: {{__FIRSTNAME__}}, {{__MESSAGE__}}, {{__SECTION_CONTENT__}}, {{__FOOTER__}}.
